title: Stories from Birchip
creator_credit: David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
brief_description: Ten stories recorded by ACMI in the Mallee town of Birchip (and one about an Art Deco cinema in nearby Charlton) to celebrate the annual Small Towns summit hosted by Birchip in August 2007. Each film created to be a part of the ACMI MAP (Memory and Place) project is under 7 minutes long and is specifically about relationship to place.
